title:
As a child(40yr ago) we lived in Lansdown sub-division, at night you could look up and see the beam of light like a lighthouse rotating across Wilmington. What ever happened to that light, when upgraded. Pretty sure it was airport tower but cant remember.





THANKS
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=8613 Since the airport beacon has been operating since 1950, it's likely that was what you were seeing down at Landsdowne.
